doc.field: Record Group 3. Fieldston School (1925-2012; 18.75 linear feet)
Record Group 3. Fieldston School (1925-2012; 18.75 linear feet)

Tate's correspondence (1929-1965) with Fieldston faculty and staff, parents, prospective students and employees, and administrators at other secondary schools and colleges. Frequent topics include college admissions, student progress, school scheduling and curriculum, facilities, textbooks, admissions to Fieldston, hiring of faculty, donations, discipline, events, and the use of school grounds. Includes a very small amount of personal correspondence, such as medical or car insurance inquiries.

Also contains some records from Tate's time at Fieldston before becoming principal, including correspondence with principal H.W. Smith and a 1929 letter accepting offer of teaching position. 1940s records include discussion of impact of World War II on the schools.
Record Group 3. Fieldston School (1925-2012; 18.75 linear feet)
